programme.title: Crime of Love
programme.desc: The beautiful Carmela, a girl of Sicilian descent who arrived in the North with her parents, falls in love with the Milanese Nullo, a work colleague. But their relationship must come to terms with the difference in the two's views: he is of anarchist ideas while she is deeply religious.

programme.title: Take Five
programme.desc: Five unlikely thieves are faced with the opportunity of a lifetime: a multi-million dollar robbery in a bank vault. At first united to carry out the plan, the gang members, however, allow themselves to be carried away by inexperience and avarice, each of them thinking of their own gain.

programme.title: The Magnificent Texan
programme.desc: Saxon is a tough, gun-wielding saloon owner who helps Mexican peasants oppose a notorious land baron who has cruelly oppressed them.

programme.title: The body
programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: An ex-con and a stuntman have to substitute two threatened rich Brazilians.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Marco Bocci's directorial debut, based on his book of the same name. In the tough Roman neighbourhood of Tor Bella Monaca, Mauro, recently left by his girlfriend, is about to discover whether being evil is something one is born with or something one becomes.

programme.title: Cinque per l'inferno
programme.desc: Cinque per l'inferno features five men caught in a dangerous mission against sinister forces.

programme.title: Stunt Squad
programme.desc: In the city of Bologna, the dangerous bandit Valli, with his group, runs an extortion racket by terrorizing merchants. On the gang's trail comes Police Commissioner Grifi, kicking off a long hunt for the extortionists and murderers.

programme.title: Erotomania
programme.desc: Lawyer Persichetti is an executive of a major oil company. The man suffers from a neurosis that prevents him from having satisfying sexual relations with both his wife Ciccia and his young and uninhibited lover Claretta. In an attempt to recover, he relies on the care of a strange psychiatrist, but without much success.

programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: An ex-con and a stuntman have to substitute two threatened rich Brazilians.

programme.desc: Marco Bocci's directorial debut, based on his book of the same name. In the tough Roman neighbourhood of Tor Bella Monaca, Mauro, recently left by his girlfriend, is about to discover whether being evil is something one is born with or something one becomes.
